(That was in the BW.  Most of my characters are more armored and larger than 
Scorponok or most of the other BW characters.  I consider those characters 
rather weak to other characters in the RPG when compared.  

Icedemon, you are incorrect.  Rhinox was outside of the CF and never went 
back until your rather recent post.

Friday, December 15th of the year 2000.  Message number 23970 posted by 
'Prodigey Child' on eGroups.  I'll just copy 'n' paste what you had:


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Rhinox



he runs up on the other side of Hot rod and started to fire bullets from his 
machine guns.


Rhinox:


"eat this you scum eating piece of slag."


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

After extensive viewing and when I thought I'd never find it because you may 
be right and I might be wrong, I found it.  You said Rhinox NEVER left the 
CF.  Explain the above message and information then.  

Let me get this nice and easy for you.  Oblitertron blew hole in hull of CF.  
Unitron, Firestarter, and Vehement fly threw hole into bridge.  Unitron, 
Firestarer, and Vehement now INSIDE the CF.  Everywhere else is lockeddown.  
That means several feet of extra metal slid down covering every entrance/exit 
of the CF, and aren't opening until the lockdown is reversed by someone with 
the authority to do so.  And Rhinox never went in before the lockdown, and 
was outside fighting people after the lockdown took affect.

So, please, keep track of your own characters.)


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
